sessions.title: Creating AI Agents in the browser using JavaScript
sessions.description:
One of the coolest things happening right now is the ability to use native AI APIs in browsers or libraries such as Transformers.js that allows you to understand users' intents, improve browsing pages, and even process images and videos without any backend behind it. How?

In this talk, attendees will get to know powerful features for Web AI and even get to know what browsers, such as Google Chrome, have been embedding AI models in the browser to create the next generation of applications.

sessions.description: In this hands-on workshop, we‚Äôll explore how Domain Driven Design (DDD) can bridge the gap between business understanding and technical implementation ‚Äî taking you from sticky notes on the wall, to team boundaries, to a coherent product architecture, and beyond.

sessions.title: Remote Work and how to land a job best practices
sessions.description:
Remote Work Mastery: Landing Your Dream Tech Job in Global Markets"
Ready to break into the global remote job market? Join this practical session where you'll discover what remote work really means and learn proven strategies to land positions with companies in the US, Canada, Europe, and Israel. We'll cover market insights for each region, the hottest in-demand skills that get you hired, and insider tips on navigating cultural differences and salary negotiations. Whether you're completely new to remote work or looking to level up your international job search, you'll leave with actionable steps to position yourself for success. Stop wondering about remote opportunities and start landing them. Your global tech career awaits!

sessions.description:
¬øQuieres crecer como desarrollador m√°s r√°pido y con impacto global?

sessions.title: Ciberseguridad y Hacking en un Mundo de IA
sessions.description: Exploraremos c√≥mo la inteligencia artificial est√° transformando el panorama de amenazas y defensas digitales. Veremos ejemplos reales de ataques y estrategias defensivas basadas en IA, y discutiremos qu√© podemos hacer para proteger sistemas y datos en este nuevo escenario.

sessions.title: Building Autonomous AI Agents with Payment Protocol Integration
sessions.description:
In this 40-minute talk, you‚Äôll learn how to design and deploy a production-ready AI recruitment agent that autonomously discovers, evaluates, and engages candidates across multiple platforms. Through live coding and architectural breakdowns, we‚Äôll explore how to combine semantic search, LLM-powered personalization, and secure API integrations to build an end-to-end recruitment automation system.
Participants will gain practical experience implementing:
- Scalable Microservices Architecture
- AI-Driven Matching
- Automated Outreach
- Integration Workflows
- Production Best Practices

sessions.title: From Lag to Fluidity: High-Performance Concurrent Frontend Architectures
sessions.description: Unlock the full potential of your applications by moving complex tasks off the main thread. This session dives deep into Web Workers, exploring practical architectural patterns for offloading heavy computations, managing background tasks, and ensuring a smooth, responsive user experience. We'll cover key considerations like data communication strategies, state management, and common pitfalls to avoid when building truly concurrent web applications with Angular.

sessions.title: Tu Genio Personal: Crea Asistentes de IA en Minutos
sessions.description:

Este workshop pr√°ctico, "Tu Genio Personal: Crea Asistentes de IA en Minutos", te dar√° ese poder. En lugar de solo hablar de IA, vamos a construirla. El taller se centra en un objetivo claro y de alt√≠simo valor: guiar a los asistentes, paso a paso, en la creaci√≥n de su propio Gem: un "Asistente de Preparaci√≥n para Entrevistas T√©cnicas".

Los participantes aprender√°n a definir la personalidad del Gem (ej. "Act√∫a como un Senior Software Engineer de Google"), a darle instrucciones precisas sobre qu√© preguntar (algoritmos, estructuras de datos, etc.) y c√≥mo dar feedback constructivo. Luego, pondremos a prueba nuestro Gem en vivo, demostrando c√≥mo usarlo para simular una entrevista real y mejorar nuestras habilidades. Para finalizar, mostraremos la incre√≠ble versatilidad de la plataforma con demostraciones r√°pidas de otros Gems pre-construidos para generar c√≥digo, asistir en tesis universitarias y crear prompts para im√°genes. Cada asistente saldr√° no solo con una idea, sino con una herramienta funcional y el conocimiento para construir cualquier asistente que imagine.

¬øQu√© Aprender√° el P√∫blico al Finalizar el Workshop?
Al finalizar esta sesi√≥n, los asistentes ser√°n capaces de:

Construir un Entrevistador de IA Personalizado: Sabr√°n c√≥mo crear y configurar desde cero un Gem dise√±ado espec√≠ficamente para simular entrevistas t√©cnicas.

Dominar el Prompt Engineering para Roles Espec√≠ficos: Aprender√°n a redactar instrucciones complejas para que la IA adopte roles y personalidades definidas (ej. entrevistador, mentor, cr√≠tico).

Simular y Prepararse para Entrevistas Reales: Entender√°n c√≥mo utilizar el Gem creado para practicar respuestas, recibir feedback y ganar confianza para sus futuras entrevistas laborales.

Aplicar la T√©cnica a Otros Dominios: Comprender√°n c√≥mo replicar el proceso para crear otros Gems de alto valor, como un asistente de c√≥digo, un generador de contenido o un consultor de proyectos.

Visualizar el Potencial Creativo y Acad√©mico: Se inspirar√°n con demostraciones r√°pidas de Gems para la generaci√≥n de im√°genes y la asistencia en la redacci√≥n de tesis.

En esta charla voy a compartir las lecciones de seguridad m√°s importantes que he aprendido en el desarrollo backend. Voy a mostrar casos reales de empresas donde errores relativamente simples terminaron costando millones de d√≥lares y afectando a millones de usuarios.
A trav√©s de ejemplos pr√°cticos en Java/Spring Boot, mostrar√© vulnerabilidades como el uso de IDs predecibles, la exposici√≥n de datos sensibles, y la falta de actualizaci√≥n de dependencias, entre otras. Cada problema se ver√° desde dos √°ngulos: c√≥mo se ve el c√≥digo vulnerable y c√≥mo implementar la soluci√≥n de forma segura.
Le puede servir mucho a desarrolladores backend, arquitectos de software o profesionales interesados en fortalecer la seguridad de sus aplicaciones.

sessions.description:
En este workshop aprender√°s, paso a paso, c√≥mo desplegar una aplicaci√≥n completa y lista para producci√≥n en solo 45 minutos, utilizando infraestructura como c√≥digo, buenas pr√°cticas de CI/CD y el poder de la IA como asistente de desarrollo.

Construiremos la infraestructura con Terraform, apoy√°ndonos en IA para generar el c√≥digo base, la documentaci√≥n t√©cnica y sugerencias de flujos de ramas en Git. Desplegaremos un backend con Strapi en Cloud Run, un frontend con Next.js, y lo conectaremos a una base de datos SQL en GCP, asegurando la soluci√≥n con Cloudflare.

El resultado ser√° una infraestructura escalable, segura y automatizada, lista para soportar alta demanda, reduciendo tiempos de implementaci√≥n y aumentando la calidad del proceso de desarrollo.

Ideal para desarrolladores, DevOps y arquitectos cloud que buscan optimizar sus flujos de trabajo y acelerar despliegues sin sacrificar buenas pr√°cticas.

sessions.title: De GKE a Cloud Run: reducir costos y complejidad en entornos cr√≠ticos
sessions.description:
En esta charla exploraremos c√≥mo migrar servicios que no necesitan un cl√∫ster completo a Cloud Run sin sacrificar seguridad ni observabilidad. Compartir√© un caso real con OpenFinance, mostrando c√≥mo logramos reducir costos, mantener trazabilidad y simplificar operaciones frente a GKE. Adem√°s, presentar√© un caso en progreso sobre un proceso de scrapping inteligente disparado por eventos. I'm a bilingual technical recruiter with 7+ years of experience connecting exceptional Latin American tech talent with innovative US companies. Originally from a Colombian-Venezuelan background and now based in Quito, Ecuador, I've built my career on one simple principle: helping developers unlock better opportunities while helping companies find the talent that drives their success.
At Awana since 2018, I've evolved from Administrator & HR to Lead Technical Recruiter, where I now manage the full recruitment lifecycle‚Äîfrom client acquisition to 90-day post-placement follow-up. I conduct 10-12 interviews daily and specialize in placing talent across fintech, healthcare AI, proptech, and crypto sectors, with a 98.89% retention rate that I'm genuinely proud of.
What sets me apart? I combine deep technical understanding with authentic human connection. I leverage AI-assisted candidate analysis and Airtable CRM to work efficiently, but I never forget that behind every resume is a person with dreams, skills, and potential. My record speaks for itself: one-day placement record, 10K+ LinkedIn network, and a track record of successful placements in roles ranging from Software Engineers to Business Analysts.
My journey hasn't been linear, from Goldman Sachs to co-founding a business, to finding my true calling in technical recruitment‚Äîbut every experience taught me something valuable about people, processes, and persistence. As a father of two and a fast learner who loves getting things done, I bring both heart and hustle to everything I do.
My mission? Bridge the gap between talented Latin American developers and companies that need them, one meaningful placement at a time.

speakers.bio:
Tex works at Thoughtworks as a Lead Consultant Developer. He has more than a decade of experience in software development. He loves to solve problems, analyze a situation, identify potential shortcomings and change course in times of difficulty and crisis. He is fluent in backend and front-end technologies, as well as software architecture and infrastructure.

Occasionally, Tex looks for opportunities to gain skills or knowledge in areas that do not fall into his primary role, such as quality assurance, user experience, and technical leadership. As a generalist, Tex can help others get started in those disciplines and increase the overall success of a project.
